name: Lost Grime
description:
This is a sequel to my first horror game Dirt! This is a stealth horror game where you have to find an escape from the forest you've fallen into.

*this game's lore is connected to two other forest games of mine*

To install, simply download the zip file and then extract the file. Then open the file and the game (.exe file) will be there!

A Devlog Type of video on my YouTube Channel!

Controls

W - Walk foward

S - Walk backwards

A - Walk left

D - Walk right

E - Interact
